item.title: EP 611 - Haunted Illinois: An Interactive Adventure!
item.itunes:title: Haunted Illinois: An Interactive Adventure!
item.description:
Today we hear a horse’s hearing problem, and then we travel to Illinois for a haunted interactive adventure!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Links:

Fortean Map

https://www.google.com/maps/d/u/0/viewer?mid=1tMKhZlGMme7LsmkPsVTUN7UV-BE&ll=52.26368324182537%2C0.4947085791530714&z=12

Humming horse puzzles vets

https://www.newscientist.com/article/mg14619750-400-humming-horse-puzzles-vets/

Objective tinnitus

https://tinyurl.com/y3tdvyov

7 KHz | 7000Hz Sine Wave Sound Frequency Tone

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_ciJKxe9VU&ab_channel=SoundNation

Top 10 Most Haunted Bridges in Illinois

https://www.dangerousroads.org/north-america/usa/4919-top-10-most-haunted-bridges-in-illinois.html

Herbert F Schirmer (1921 - 2006)

https://www.ancientfaces.com/person/herbert-f-schirmer-birth-1921-death-2006/11325965

CAMP FALCON

https://www.hauntedplaces.org/item/camp-falcon/

GIRL SCOUTS TERRORIZED ON CAMPOUT

https://www.chicagotribune.com/news/ct-xpm-1987-06-03-8702100808-story.html

Man gets 30 years for 37-year-old murder

https://www.daily-journal.com/news/local/man-gets-30-years-for-37-year-old-murder/article_849535a6-797a-5b99-a99e-e93aa55dcdbb.html#:~:text=Small%20was%20sentenced%20to%2030,guilty%20to%20first%2Ddegree%20murder.

Airtight Bridge murder victim honored by daughter who barely knew her

https://jg-tc.com/lifestyles/airtight-bridge-murder-victim-honored-by-daughter-who-barely-knew/article_f7641b25-5e81-549f-acc0-faaad7619af0.html

Airtight Bridge

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airtight_Bridge

Haunted Or Not? Bloods Point Road and Bridge

https://967theeagle.net/haunted-or-not-bloods-point-road-and-bridge/?utm_source=tsmclip&utm_medium=referral

Bloodspoint Road, the site of many hauntings and crimes

https://www.dangerousroads.org/north-america/usa/4375-bloodspoint-road.html

Driving Through the Seven Gates of Hell in Collinsville, Illinois

https://raulersongirlstravel.com/seven-gates-of-hell-in-collinsville/

Tinfoil Alley: The Seven Gates of Hell of Collinsville, Illinois

https://www.warmsodamag.com/culture/tinfoil-alley-the-seven-gates-of-hell-of-collinsville-illinois

Afterlife: The Legend of the Seven Gates of Hell

http://thehorrorsyndicate.com/2017/12/the-legend-of-the-seven-gates-of-hell/

The Seven Gates Of Hell

http://www.huntersoftheunknown.com/the-seven-gates-of-hell.html

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
